messages.title: Dear Neighbour,
messages.content: Labour promised us so much. We hoped things would get better. Now those hopes are all in tatters.

messages.title: Lisaâ€™s contract with you as your next MP
messages.content: Being an MP is a full-time job. I will work hard to earn your trust. I want to prove to you that politicians are not all the same; an expression I hear on virtually every street when I speak to people.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats would introduce an 'elected' NHS board to halt top-down reorganisation by politicians not involved in direct patient care.
Plan to turn empty shops into affordable places to start small businesses, proposing to cut business rates and regenerating town centres.
This will stop millions of low and non-earners - and pensioners - from paying any tax.
Proposing improved justice with neighbourhood police and resisting antisocial behaviour through early community-based interventions.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Gordon Brown deserves to lose this election - there's no doubt about that. But there's no Labour MP we can vote out here in Bournemouth East, only our conservative MP. He has declared Bournemouth his second home.

issues.economy: The Liberal Democrats would introduce an 'elected' NHS board to halt top-down reorganisation by politicians not involved in direct patient care. Plan to turn empty shops into affordable places to start small businesses, proposing to cut business rates and regenerating town centres.
